sentences.en: A baby is an inestimable blessing and bother. --- Mark Twain.
sentences.cn: 孩子,是 不可估量 的幸福和辛苦. 马克?吐温将两个性质截然不同的词并置,且压头韵来表示孩子对于我们的意味,可谓深悟凡人生活的不同方面.

sentences.en: After all, it has the inestimable advantage of hindsight.
sentences.cn: 毕竟, 事后看问题的好处不可估量.

sentences.en: Brain drain will cause inestimable losses to enterprises.
sentences.cn: 核心员工一旦流失,将对企业造成不可估量的损失.

sentences.en: Good health is an inestimable prize.
He made a contribution of inestimable importance in the field of dynamics.
sentences.cn: 他在力学领域作出了一项无可估量的贡献.

sentences.en: Human life is of inestimable value.
I have not tallied up the inestimable benefit.
sentences.cn: 我尚未计算那些无法估量的利益.

sentences.en: In the walls were set pictures of inestimable art.
sentences.cn: 墙上镶嵌的图画都是价值连城的珍品.

sentences.en: Liberty can not be valued by money. liberty an inestimable good.
sentences.cn: 自由是不能以金钱来衡量的, 自由是无价的财富.

sentences.en: The inestimable value of our Federal Union is felt and acknowledged by all.
sentences.cn: 大家皆感知并承认我们联邦至高无尚的价值.

sentences.en: The information he provided was of inestimable value .
sentences.cn: 他提供的信息价值难以估量。

sentences.en: The political implications of this case are inestimable.
sentences.cn: 这个案子的政治影响是不可估量的.

sentences.en: The value of that antique is inestimable.
sentences.cn: 那件古董的价值无法估计.

sentences.en: The value of your assistance is inestimable.
sentences.cn: 阁下鼎力相助之功不可胜言.

trans.tran_cn: 极贵重的，（大得）无法估计的，不可估量
trans.tran_en: too much or too great to be calculated
